entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who does not know the new boy's name. He is described as having pale eyes and muttering faster and more furiously than ever when he sees Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced by Hermione as the new boy. Kreacher does not know his name at first but recognizes him later.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is talking to Kreacher and introduces Harry Potter to him. She also tries to calm down Ron and Ginny when they get angry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron gets angry with Hermione for calling her a Mudblood.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny also gets angry with Hermione for calling her a Mudblood.

entities.name: mudblood
entities.description: Mudblood is a term used by Kreacher to refer to Hermione. It is considered derogatory and Ron and Ginny get angry when they hear it.
